questions.quote: What, was that not politically correct? It's a legitimate question.
I know what you thought. They don't have homes, they don't have jobs, what do they need the top of a muffin for? They're lucky to get the stumps.
Strange. For new pants, there's noticable wear on the buttocks of those chinos. Wait those are the clothes from the bag!
Scott!  Remember what we talked about the other day?  George is into it.
Who do I know who would have even been in a limousine yesterday anyway. Uhh-O h-owow!
Well, it's a tough decision. I have to wear these every day. I'm deciding on a new face.
You got it. Hey Jerry, do me a favor. The next time you see that lineswoman ask her how those ball boys get those jobs. I would love to be able to do that.
Oh, no, Just a custom. Uh, THAT'S MY FRIEND GEORGE. YOU LOOK GOOD.
And a guy will appear from out of nowhere. I say "Get out of here! What do you want? You don't belong here!"
The cable? No, no, no. I'm having a party here. You can't do this now!
